meanings.definition: Paint applied over an existing layer of paint.
meanings.sent1: The overpainting on the canvas added depth to the artwork.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully added overpainting to enhance the colors.
meanings.sent3: The overpainting on the wall made it look like a rainbow had melted.
meanings.sent4: Her overpainting was like a veil hiding the original colors underneath.
meanings.sent5: The overpainting stood out, making the whole painting come alive.

meanings.definition: The act of painting over something.
meanings.sent1: After the overpainting, the old design was completely covered.
meanings.sent2: Overpainting can sometimes be used to fix mistakes in a painting.
meanings.sent3: The overpainting turned the room into a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: His overpainting of the mural transformed it into a new masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The overpainting process requires precision and patience.
